md:
giải nghĩa từ "conducting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

- conducting (verb): 
	+ Meaning: to direct or control something, such as an orchestra or a business.
	+ Vietnamese: điều khiển, chỉ huy.
	+ Example: The conductor is conducting the orchestra in a beautiful symphony.
	+ Related words: conductor, direction, control.

- conducting (verb): 
	+ Meaning: to carry out or perform an investigation, experiment, or study.
	+ Vietnamese: tiến hành, thực hiện.
	+ Example: The scientists are conducting a research on the effects of climate change.
	+ Related words: investigation, experiment, study.

- conducting (noun): 
	+ Meaning: the act of directing or controlling something.
	+ Vietnamese: sự điều khiển, sự chỉ huy.
	+ Example: The conducting of the company is under the CEO's responsibility.
	+ Related words: direction, control, management.

Note: The meaning of "conducting" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "conducting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • conducting (verb):

    • Meaning: to direct or control something, such as an orchestra or a business.
    • Vietnamese: điều khiển, chỉ huy.
    • Example: The conductor is conducting the orchestra in a beautiful symphony.
    • Related words: conductor, direction, control.

  • conducting (verb):

    • Meaning: to carry out or perform an investigation, experiment, or study.
    • Vietnamese: tiến hành, thực hiện.
    • Example: The scientists are conducting a research on the effects of climate change.
    • Related words: investigation, experiment, study.

  • conducting (noun):

    • Meaning: the act of directing or controlling something.
    • Vietnamese: sự điều khiển, sự chỉ huy.
    • Example: The conducting of the company is under the CEO's responsibility.
    • Related words: direction, control, management.

Note: The meaning of "conducting" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
